MOV pc, lr
AREA    subRoutTest, CODE, READONLY
                   
        ENTRY                     
start   MOV     r0, #10           
        MOV     r1, #3

        LDR     r1, =0x20026      ; ADP_Stopped_ApplicationExit
        SWI     0x123456          ; ARM semihosting SWI
apple   ADD     r0, r0, r1        ; Subroutine code
        MOV     pc, lr            ; Return from subroutine
